mapper.insert: insert into user_info (user_id, user_pw, user_nick, user_birthdate, user_gender, user_joindate) values(#{email}, #{password}, #{username}, #{age}, #{gender}, #{joindate})
mapper.select: select * from user_info where user_id=#{id} and user_pw=#{pw}
select * from notification_info where user_id=#{user_id} order by noti_seq desc
mapper.delete: delete from notification_info where user_id=#{user_id} and noti_seq=#{noti_seq}
mapper.select: select * from user_info u, gameuser_info g where u.user_id = g.user_id and u.user_nick=#{user_nick}
